name: Mr Hide - Pick And Flip It Up
name_original: Mr Hide - Pick And Flip It Up
description:
Welcome to the most exciting and challenging memory game that will put your memory and concentration skills to the test.

The concept of the game is very simple. All you have to do is find Mr Hide under the right color block. There are three or more identical blocks that are shuffling randomly. Each level gets harder and faster.

Can you find Mr Hide?

Download the game today for FREE and start training your eyes and concentration. Have fun and good luck finding Mr Hide!
